pages.text: Tasmanian Devils are small marsupials found in temperate or roofed forest biomes.$(br2)When attacking their preis (rabbits or chickens), all nearby Tasmanian Devils will join in on the hunt.$(br2)The Tasmanian Devil will unleash a howl that turns their eyes red and can scare away all nearby monsters for a short time.
Their favorite food of Rotten Flesh. These little creatures cannot be tamed, but they can be bred with any meat.
